column2:
"Hey, nice work! Me? Oh, I've finally relaxed a bit, and after
a break, I'll wrap things up!"

"This fun event is almost over!
Not everything can be just fun
and games, right!"

"Ah, that's right, that reminds
me, Afin was just here looking
for you!"

"He said he wanted to ask for your help!
He's looking for the small,
pure white flower that I recommended!"

"Hahaha, I wonder for whom, too!
Who does Afin think
he's going to give it to?!"
